short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto-opening of cases at a given time, automate your actions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you constantly on the go, busy with work, or simply away from your devices when your daily free cases unlock?

The site opens in a new tab by itself, so you don't have to interact with it more than necessary.

Our extension is designed to help reduce your addiction by encouraging you to spend less time on the site.

With this extension your daily free cases will always be opened, no matter where you are or what you're doing.

Plus, stay tuned for upcoming features like an XP calculator and many others. Elevate your experience and never miss out on daily free cases again!

How Does It Work?

1. Select the number of free cases you have.
2. (Optional) Choose the order in which you want the free cases to be opened.
3. Set the time when your free daily cases are available.
4. Once the free cases are opened, the timer restarts and opens free cases again in 24h.

IMPORTANT:

Your browser must remain open. You can continue using your device as usual; the extension will automatically open a new tab at the specified time.

For suggestions, bug reports, news, and more, feel free to join our Discord community! (Click the Discord button in the extension)
